TASK: Craft an item of type: blue_wool
inventory=[{"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "fire_charge", "quantity": 47, "index": 18}, {"type": "witch_spawn_egg", "quantity": 31, "index": 20}, {"type": "purple_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "dark_oak_trapdoor", "quantity": 22, "index": 27}, {"type": "end_portal_frame", "quantity": 53, "index": 28}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_pressure_plate", "quantity": 46, "index": 41}, {"type": "birch_trapdoor", "quantity": 63, "index": 43}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 4, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft white_wool, I need to place 4 strings in a square in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will first move one string from slot 44 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok

inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "fire_charge", "quantity": 47, "index": 18}, {"type": "witch_spawn_egg", "quantity": 31, "index": 20}, {"type": "purple_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "dark_oak_trapdoor", "quantity": 22, "index": 27}, {"type": "end_portal_frame", "quantity": 53, "index": 28}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_pressure_plate", "quantity": 46, "index": 41}, {"type": "birch_trapdoor", "quantity": 63, "index": 43}]

Ok
